Name: Milk Chocolate S'mores Bonbon
Description: A sugary bonbon made with a hard milk chocolate shell over marshmallow creme and graham cracker crumbs.

NameLocalization.zh: 牛奶巧克力烤棉花糖格雷厄姆夹心

DescriptionLocalization.ko: 단단한 밀크초콜렛에 마시멜로크림을 채우고 그레이엄 크래커 크럼블을 곁들인 달콤한 봉봉.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ein zuckerhaltiger Bonbon mit einer harten Milchschokoladenschale über Marshmallow-Creme und Graham-Cracker-Krümel.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 稍硬的牛奶巧克力包裹着成分为烤棉花糖以及格雷厄姆饼干屑的奶油。再加上饼干屑在外层的装饰，仿佛置入了S'mores以及牛奶巧克力交接的天堂。
